abstractText: An illuminated Nepalese paper manuscript of a Dhāraṇī Collection, consisting of the Pañcaviṃśatikāprajñāpāramitāhṛdaya, the Dhvajāgrakeyūrī, the Āryāmokṣapada, andthe Sahasrabhujalokeśvara.

title: Dhāraṇī Collection
